description:
Tire pressure can be a challenge. Mountain bikes require lots of air, road bikes need high pressure. This no-compromise floor pump lets you move from high-volume mode to high-pressure mode with the flick of a switch.

  • foot-activated high-pressure/high-volume switch
  • Wide base is made of stamped steel for stability and durability
  • Pump body is made of aluminum
  • Pump head is Presta- and Schrader-compatible
  • Hidden needle adapter and plastic valve adapter
  • Analogue pressure gauge tops out at 160psi
name: Crankbrothers Gem Floor Pump
